author: scott+github@konobi.co.uk
msg: Fix a few behavioural issues and add debugging to console feature:
* Ensure that Device.init and Device.exec behave in a event
queue fashion rather than clobbering exec calls
* Ensure that Device.Location.init() will fire callback only
once the CSLocationManager has actually initialized and
* Add the ability to log to the XCode debugging console, requires
